children.text:
DailyRoads Voyager allows you to continuously record videos and capture photos during your journeys. 

The app records everything, but only important events are retained - either automatically (g-force event) or you get to choose what to keep simply by touching the screen, even while you drive. 

Speed, elevation and GPS coordinates can also be shown on the videos/photos within the app. To embed such data in the exported video sequences, you can use the Overlays settings. 

More info on http://dailyroads.com/voyager/ 

No personal information is collected from the phone, but for the purpose of statistics and targeted advertising, third-party libraries may collect, store, share and/or transfer various anonymous end-user IDs and location data. 

Please contact us if you would like to help with testing, or translations. Translate as much or as little as you can, when you have the time, and in-app ads will be disabled for you. Additionally, for significant help you get free licenses for our future apps, and extra credits for server-side services. 

Contact us at voyager@dailyroads.com
Enjoy, and have a safe journey!

content-desc: Touch to add your plus one to the existing
